text: Bigu ej rasul, ʙa on masxarakunandagoni axli kitoʙ: «Ej ahli kitoʙ, ojo intiqomi sumo cuz in cizi digare hast, ki mo ʙa Alloh va on ci ʙar mo nozil suda va on ci pes az in nozil sudaast, imon ovardaem. Va ʙidoned, ki ʙestari sumo fosiq hasted. (Ja'ne, az to'ati Ilohi ʙerun rafta va ʙar irtikoʙi gunoh cur'at kardaed»)
